src:
Наказаха четирима от Атлетик (Куклен)

04 Nov 2019, 13:13

На свое заседание от 4 ноември Дисциплинарната комисия при Зоналния съвет на БФС - Пловдив наложи следните наказания:
                                Трета лига - Югоизточна група

text:
Four of Athletic (Kuklen) punished

04 Nov 2019, 12:13

At its meeting on November 4, the Disciplinary Committee of the BFS-Plovdiv Regional Council imposed the following penalties:
Third League - Southeastern Group
Dimitar Dimitrov (Karlovo) 5th yellow card 1 match
Emil Argirov (Kuklen) 5th yellow card 1 match
Vasil Santov (Svilengrad) 5th yellow card 1 match
Shaban Osmanov (Parvomay) 5th yellow card 1 match
Radoslav Kalchev (R.Dolina) 5th yellow card 1 match
Sioner Polat (Haskovo) 5th yellow card 1 match
Nicola Marin (Giant) 5th yellow card 1 match
Todor Todorov (Giant) 5th yellow card 1 match
Atanas Chernev (Puppet) red card 1 match
Atanas Apostolov (R. Dolina) red card 2 matches
Stoyan Zdravkov (Kuklen) on report 1 meeting
Angel Semerdzhiev (Kuklen) on report 1 meeting
"B" District Group
Kostadin Apostolov (G. Chardak) red card 1 match
Rangel Dinev (G. Chardak) red card 1 match

Hakan Mustafa (Haskovo) Red Card 1 Match
